tool_description: Retrieves specific scriptural passages from a primary source database using standardized biblical references.

book.description: Name of the biblical book (e.g., Genesis, Matthew, Quran)

verse_end.description: Ending verse number for passage ranges

error_messages: Invalid book name: Provide a recognized book name from the specified tradition.
Chapter out of range: The chapter number exceeds what exists for this book.
Invalid verse range: verse_start must be <= verse_end, and both must exist in the chapter.
Unsupported tradition: Use one of [Christian, Jewish, Islamic].
usage: Specify book, chapter, and verse_start; optionally set verse_end for ranges and tradition for specific religious contexts. Returns the requested scriptural text passage.

reference.description: Standardized reference format for the retrieved passage

word_count.description: Number of words in the retrieved passage
